--- title: "Learning to Love Regexes By Learning Them" subtitle: "I Promised Myself I Wouldn't Do This Again" description: "Building a regex generator for self-contained, well-defined string detection problems is a very effective way to learn regular expressions." format: html: reference-location: margin other-links: - text: Regex Cheatsheet icon: bookmark-plus href: https://github.com/raredd/regex - text: RexEgg icon: bookmark-plus href: https://www.rexegg.com/ - text: Regex in R icon: bookmark-plus href: https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/base/html/regex.html editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- ::: {.cell} ::: # HCPCS ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} `````{=html} 
               Count                                   Regex
All            18903 (^[A-CEGHJ-MP-V0-9][0-9]{3}[AFMTU0-9]$)
Level I        10985                  (^[0-9]{4}[AFMTU0-9]$)
Category I      7918              (^[A-CEGHJ-MP-V][0-9]{4}$)
Category II     9990                    (^[0-9]{4}[AMU0-9]$)
Category III     565                           (^[0-9]{4}F$)
Level II         430                           (^[0-9]{4}T$)
````` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} `````{=html} 
## [1] 1 2 3 4
`````[1] "blue" "green" "yellow" NA ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: # TODO * ~~If a **wildcard** begins with a **letter**, the *postfix* should be `[0-9]{n}`.~~ * Eliminate `g1()` step in grouping. * In `remove_redundant()`, try pmap for `rr()` step. ## Checklist - [X] `split_lengths()` - [X] `remove_redundant()` - [ ] `process_groups()` - [X] `g1()` - [X] `g2()` - [ ] `g3()` - [ ] `g4()` - [ ] `g5()` - [ ] `reduce_groups()` # Preprocessing ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} take <- \(x, i) stringfish::sf_substr(x, start = i, stop = i, nthreads = 4L) empty <- \(x) vctrs::vec_is_empty(x) chop <- \(v, g) vctrs::vec_chop(v, sizes = vctrs::vec_run_sizes(g)) p <- \(...) paste0(..., collapse = "") grab <- \(x) x[stringfish::sf_grepl(x, "[A-Z]{1}", nthreads = 4L)] contrast <- \(x, y) x[!stringfish::sf_substr(x, 1, collapse::funique(collapse::vlengths(y, use.names = FALSE)), nthreads = 4L) %in% y] sorder <- \(x) p(p(grab(stringr::str_sort(x))), p(stringr::str_sort(x)[!stringr::str_sort(x) %in% grab(stringr::str_sort(x))])) ``` ::: ## `split_lengths()` ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} split_lengths <- function(x) { stopifnot(is.character(x)) x <- sf_gsub(x, "\\*|\\s", "", nthreads = 4L) |> uniq_rmna() |> str_sort() l <- vlengths(x) list( x1 = x[l == 1], x2 = x[l == 2], x3 = x[l == 3], x4 = x[l == 4], x5 = x[l == 5] ) } ``` ::: ## `remove_redundant()` If a vector contains both `"A"` and `"A0"`, remove `"A0"`. Why? A user may input complete and incomplete HCPCS codes alongside each other. Codes that contain a common sub-string can be simplified, in turn simplifying the eventual regex output. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} rr <- \(x, y) { if (empty(x)) { # cat(c("EMPTY: x | RETURN: character(0)"), sep = "\n") return(character(0)) } if (empty(y)) { # cat(c("EMPTY: y | RETURN: x"), sep = "\n") return(x) } contrast(x, y) } remove_redundant <- function(x) { .c(x1, x2, x3, x4, x5) %=% x list( x1 = x1, x2 = rr(x2, x1), x3 = rr(x3, x1) |> rr(x2), x4 = rr(x4, x1) |> rr(x2) |> rr(x3), x5 = rr(x5, x1) |> rr(x2) |> rr(x3) |> rr(x4) ) } random_hcpcs_vec(10) |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $x1 [1] "1" "3" "4" "6" "7" "8" "E" "L" "M" "R" $x2 [1] "99" "A8" "J0" "V2" $x3 [1] "000" "256" "H10" "H20" "V52" $x4 [1] "0342" "2503" "9358" $x5 [1] "22818" "93463" "C1785" "T1019" ``` ::: ::: # Grouping Group each set of vectors into regex patterns. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} lump <- function(x, threshold = 3) { stopifnot(is.numeric(x)) xo <- order(x) xs <- x[xo] dlag <- abs(c(0, xs[-1] - xs[seq_along(xs) - 1])) bi <- ifelse(dlag >= threshold, 1, 0) id <- cumsum(bi) + 1 id[xo] } letters_2_numbers <- \(x) { hcpcs <- LETTERS[sf_grepl(LETTERS, "[^DINOW-Z]", nthreads = 4L)] look <- set_names(seq_along(hcpcs), hcpcs) unname(look[grab(x)]) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: ::: {.panel-tabset} ## [g1|g2] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g1 <- function(x) { x <- get_elem(x, "x1") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) x } g2 <- function(x) { x <- get_elem(x, "x2") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) rsplit(x, take(x, 1), use.names = FALSE) } random_hcpcs_vec() |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "3" "7" "9" "A" "C" "E" "Q" "R" "T" "U" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} random_hcpcs_vec() |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g2() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [[1]] [1] "27" [[2]] [1] "85" [[3]] [1] "96" [[4]] [1] "E0" [[5]] [1] "J2" ``` ::: ::: ## [g3] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g3 <- function(x) { x <- get_elem(x, "x3") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) chr <- grab(x) num <- x[!x %in% chr] num <- data.table( code = num, lump = lump(as.integer(num))) chr <- data.table( code = chr, lump = lump(as.integer(str_replace_all(chr, "[A-Z]", letters_2_numbers)))) out <- vec_c( if (empty(num)) NULL else chop(num$code, num$lump), if (empty(chr)) NULL else chop(chr$code, chr$lump)) if (empty(out)) return(character(0)) out } x <- all_tests[nchar(all_tests) == 3] |> split_lengths() three <- all_tests[nchar(all_tests) == 3] |> split_lengths() |> # remove_redundant() |> g3() three <- three[collapse::radixorder(collapse::vlengths(three), sort = FALSE)] orphans <- three[collapse::vlengths(three) == 1] |> purrr::list_c() groups <- three[collapse::vlengths(three) > 1] modifyList( setNames( groups, paste0("group_", collapse::vlengths(groups)) ), list(orphans = orphans)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $group_2 [1] "021" "022" $group_2 [1] "026" "027" $group_2 [1] "032" "033" $group_2 [1] "042" "044" $group_2 [1] "347" "348" $group_2 [1] "503" "505" $group_2 [1] "552" "553" $group_2 [1] "610" "612" $group_2 [1] "644" "646" $group_2 [1] "G02" "G04" $group_3 [1] "920" "921" "922" $group_5 [1] "585" "586" "587" "588" "589" $group_9 [1] "721" "722" "723" "724" "725" "726" "727" "728" "729" $orphans [1] "050" "157" "209" "225" "271" "308" "312" "326" "355" "362" "544" "630" [13] "765" "958" "C75" "C97" "E06" "S23" ``` ::: ::: ## [4] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g4 <- function(x) { x <- get_elem(x, "x4") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) chr <- grab(x) num <- x[!x %in% chr] num <- data.table(code = num, lump = lump(as.integer(num))) chr <- data.table( code = chr, lump = lump( as.integer( str_replace_all(chr, "[A-Z]", letters_2_numbers) ))) out <- vec_c( if (empty(num)) NULL else chop(num$code, num$lump), if (empty(chr)) NULL else chop(chr$code, chr$lump)) if (empty(out)) return(character(0)) return(out) } hcpcs_tests[20:25] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g4() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [[1]] [1] "5203" "5204" "5205" "5206" "5207" "5208" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> # remove_redundant() |> g4() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [[1]] [1] "0214" "0215" "0217" "0218" "0219" "0220" "0221" "0222" [[2]] [1] "0263" "0265" "0266" [[3]] [1] "0269" [[4]] [1] "0274" "0275" [[5]] [1] "0329" "0330" [[6]] [1] "0422" [[7]] [1] "0444" "0445" [[8]] [1] "0506" "0507" [[9]] [1] "1577" [[10]] [1] "2093" [[11]] [1] "2251" "2252" [[12]] [1] "2719" [[13]] [1] "3080" [[14]] [1] "3123" [[15]] [1] "3267" [[16]] [1] "3471" [[17]] [1] "3481" "3482" "3483" [[18]] [1] "3557" [[19]] [1] "3622" [[20]] [1] "5030" [[21]] [1] "5054" [[22]] [1] "5442" "5443" [[23]] [1] "5520" [[24]] [1] "5525" [[25]] [1] "5530" [[26]] [1] "5857" [[27]] [1] "5860" [[28]] [1] "5870" "5872" [[29]] [1] "5880" [[30]] [1] "5890" "5892" "5894" [[31]] [1] "6100" [[32]] [1] "6125" [[33]] [1] "6303" "6304" [[34]] [1] "6442" [[35]] [1] "6448" "6449" [[36]] [1] "6463" [[37]] [1] "7651" [[38]] [1] "9202" [[39]] [1] "9208" [[40]] [1] "9213" "9214" [[41]] [1] "9220" "9222" "9223" "9224" [[42]] [1] "9587" [[43]] [1] "C750" [[44]] [1] "C977" [[45]] [1] "E067" [[46]] [1] "G027" [[47]] [1] "G041" [[48]] [1] "S234" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} all_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g4() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` character(0) ``` ::: ::: ## [5] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g5 <- function(x) { x <- get_elem(x, "x5") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) chr <- grab(x) num <- x[!x %in% chr] num <- data.table(code = num, lump = lump(as.integer(num))) chr <- data.table( code = chr, lump = lump( as.integer( str_remove_all(chr, "[A-Z]") ))) # dchr <- as.integer(str_remove_all(chr, "^[A-Z]|[A-Z]$")) # # dchr <- ifelse(dchr %% 10 == 0, dchr + max(dchr), dchr) # # chr <- data.table( # code = chr, # lump = lump(dchr)) out <- vec_c( if (empty(num)) NULL else chop(num$code, num$lump), if (empty(chr)) NULL else chop(chr$code, chr$lump)) if (empty(out)) return(character(0)) out } hcpcs_tests[26:30] |> split_lengths() |> # remove_redundant() |> g5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [[1]] [1] "92015" "92016" "92017" "92018" "92019" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> [[117]] [1] "L4396" [[118]] [1] "L4397" [[119]] [1] "L4398" "L4631" ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: ::: # Process Groups ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} process_groups <- function(x) { list( g1 = g1(x), g2 = g2(x), g3 = g3(x), g4 = g4(x), g5 = g5(x) ) } hcpcs_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $g1 [1] "0" "4" "5" "6" "G" "J" $g2 $g2[[1]] [1] "30" "31" "32" $g3 $g3[[1]] [1] "721" "722" "723" "724" "725" "726" "727" "728" "729" $g4 character(0) $g5 $g5[[1]] [1] "92015" "92016" "92017" "92018" "92019" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $g1 [1] "0" "1" "2" "3" "5" "6" "7" "9" "C" "E" "G" "S" $g2 character(0) $g3 character(0) $g4 character(0) $g5 character(0) ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} all_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $g1 [1] "0" "4" "5" "6" "G" "J" $g2 $g2[[1]] [1] "15" $g2[[2]] [1] "20" "22" "27" $g2[[3]] [1] "30" "31" "32" "34" "35" "36" $g2[[4]] [1] "76" $g2[[5]] [1] "92" "95" $g2[[6]] [1] "C7" "C9" $g2[[7]] [1] "E0" $g2[[8]] [1] "S2" $g3 $g3[[1]] [1] "721" "722" "723" "724" "725" "726" "727" "728" "729" $g4 character(0) $g5 character(0) ``` ::: ::: ## Reduce Runs ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} reduce_runs <- function(x) { ad <- c(LETTERS, 0:9) if (x == paste0(ad, collapse = "")) return("[A-Z0-9]") vec <- set_names(rep(0, 36), ad) vec2 <- vec[splitter(x)] vec2 <- vec2[!is.na(vec2)] vec[names(vec2)] <- 1 vec_group <- dplyr::tibble( value = names(vec), key = vec, idx = seq_along(vec), group = dplyr::consecutive_id(key)) |> dplyr::mutate(group_size = dplyr::n(), .by = group) |> dplyr::filter(key == 1, group_size >= 3) |> dplyr::select(value, group) if (empty(vec_group)) return(x) xgroups <- chop(vec_group$value, vec_group$group) |> purrr::map(fuimus::collapser) |> purrr::list_c() replacements <- dplyr::left_join( dplyr::slice_min(vec_group, by = group, order_by = value) |> dplyr::rename(start = value), dplyr::slice_max(vec_group, by = group, order_by = value) |> dplyr::rename(end = value), by = dplyr::join_by(group)) |> glue::glue_data("{start}-{end}") |> as.vector() res <- stringi::stri_replace_all_regex(x, xgroups, replacements, vectorize_all = FALSE) paste0("[", res, "]") } ``` ::: ## G == 1 ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} p1 <- function(x) { g1 <- get_elem(x, "g1") if (empty(g1)) return(NULL) re <- sorder(g1) |> reduce_runs() if (re == "[A-Z0-9]") return(paste0("(^", re, "{5}$)")) postfix <- ifelse( sf_grepl(re, "^\\[?[A-Z]\\-?", nthreads = 4L), "[0-9]", "[A-Z0-9]") return(paste0("(^", re, postfix, "{4}$)")) } hcpcs_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^[GJ04-6][0-9]{4}$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^[CEGS0-35-79][0-9]{4}$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} list(g1 = c(0:9, LETTERS)) |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^[A-Z0-9]{5}$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} list(g1 = c(LETTERS[1:5], 0:9)) |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^[A-E0-9][0-9]{4}$)" ``` ::: ::: ## G > 1 ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} p2 <- function(x) { if (empty(x)) return(NULL) vecs <- str_split_fixed(x, "", fmax(vlengths(x))) |> as.data.frame() to_brackets <- vecs |> purrr::map(fuimus::uniq_rmna) |> purrr::map(sorder) to_vec <- to_brackets |> purrr::map(reduce_runs) multi_chars <- unname(nchar(to_vec) > 1) nobrack <- stringr::str_detect(to_vec[multi_chars], "\\[|\\]", TRUE) to_vec[multi_chars] <- ifelse( any(nobrack), purrr::map_chr(to_vec[multi_chars], \(x) paste0("[", x, "]")), to_vec[multi_chars]) purrr::list_c(to_vec) |> fuimus::collapser() } ``` ::: ## Reduce Groups ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} vrg <- function(x, n) { if (is.null(x)) return(NULL) postfix <- ifelse( sf_grepl(x, "^\\[?[A-Z]\\-?", nthreads = 4L), "[0-9]", "[A-Z0-9]") x <- ifelse( n == 0, paste0("(^", x, "$)"), paste0("(^", x, postfix, "{", n, "}$)")) paste0(x , collapse = "|") } reduce_groups <- function(x) { list( g1 = p1(x), g2 = map_vec(x$g2, p2) |> vrg(3), g3 = map_vec(x$g3, p2) |> vrg(2), g4 = map_vec(x$g4, p2) |> vrg(1), g5 = map_vec(x$g5, p2) |> vrg(0) ) |> compact() |> paste0(collapse = "|") } all_tests[nchar(all_tests) > 2] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> reduce_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^02[12][A-Z0-9]{2}$)|(^520[2-8][A-Z0-9]{1}$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} hcpcs_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> reduce_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^[GJ04-6][0-9]{4}$)|(^3[0-2][A-Z0-9]{3}$)|(^72[1-9][A-Z0-9]{2}$)|(^9201[5-9]$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> reduce_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^[CEGS0-35-79][0-9]{4}$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2[nchar(long_test2) == 4] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> reduce_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^02[12][12][A-Z0-9]{1}$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} new_test |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> reduce_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^9046[01]$)" ``` ::: ::: # `medrex()` ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} medrex <- function(x) { x |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> reduce_groups() } # REMOVE {1} FROM EXPRS WITH 5 CHARS medrex(long_test2[nchar(long_test2) > 3]) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "(^02[12][12][A-Z0-9]{1}$)" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} vec_slice( hcpcs, sf_grepl(hcpcs, medrex(long_test2[nchar(long_test2) > 3]) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "0211T" "0211U" "0212T" "0212U" "0221T" "0221U" "0222T" "0222U" ``` ::: ::: {{<
